347490.name: Fantasy Grounds - Top-down Tokens - Heroic 1
347490.description:
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game.
This token pack contains 28 tokens: This pack contains an assortment of characters comprised of several races. Perfect for PC's NPC's and enemies.
  • Dwarves (3) fighters
  • Elf (5) druid, fighter-mage, fighter, mage
  • Half-Giant barbarian
  • Halfling rogue and bard
  • Humans - Mage, Ranger, Barbian, Archer, Avenger, Cleric, Crosbowman, Druid, Monk, Paladin
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
